#summary add resizeable functionality for Remote and Effect Div.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The Attributes resizeable ="true" extends the [DivTag Remote] and [EffectDivTag Effect Div].

Take a look at the [http://www.weinfreund.de/struts2-jquery-showcase/index.action Showcase] to see what this tag provides.

= Samples =

==A resizeable Remote Div==
A Remote Div that load AJAX content and is resizeable. 
{{{
    <s:url id="ajax" value="/ajax3.action"/>
    <sj:div href="%{ajax}" indicator="indicator" resizable="true" resizableAnimate="true" resizableGhost="true" resizableHelper="ui-state-highlight" resizableAspectRatio="true" cssStyle="width: 250px; height: 180px;" cssClass="ui-widget-content ui-corner-all">
        <img id="indicator" src="images/indicator.gif" alt="Loading..." style="display:none"/>
    </sj:div>
}}}

==A resizeable Effect Div==
{{{
    <sj:effectDiv resizable="true" resizableAnimate="true" resizableGhost="true" resizableHandles="all" cssClass="ui-widget-content ui-corner-all" cssStyle="width: 250px; height: 180px; padding: 0.5em;">
        Resize me!<br/>
        Resize me!<br/>
        Resize me!<br/>
    </sj:effectDiv>
}}}
